forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plenty of sunshine. High 19C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Lots of sunshine. High 66F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening followed by increasing clouds with showers developing after midnight. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 17C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 61F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 18C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 63F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 61F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 64F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low around 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 64F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.
